title: What disgusts you during a lockdown? - Quora

response.answer_text: It disgusts me to see that people aren't taking the pandemic seriously even after all these restrictions. Incident 1: My husband went to pick up some paracetamol tablets at the local pharmacy. The store in addition to selling medicine also sells general items. People are standing in the queue breaking the protocol of having to step out only in an emergency. They are wanting to buy gulab jamun mix and maggi noodles. I mean,why can't one survive without these petty things during the lockdown? Questioning these idiots will result in an awkward quarrel. Similarly, people have no qualms standing in long queues to pick up items like Gobi manchurian mix and party hats from supermarkets when there are some of us struggling to pick up essentials. Incident 2 Very clearly the PM spoke of social distancing while lighting candles today to fight corona. What did some idiots do? Used this as an opportunity to step out with candles and diyas in groups. Roamed the streets screaming their lungs out asking the virus to leave. And bursting crackers and clicking selfies. What disgusts me during the lockdown? That how the stupidity of all a few people is the deciding factor for the health of us. Not following social protocols when required and then spreading the virus to the rest of us. People need to understand that the lockdown is in place for our safety. It is not a vacation or an opportunity to form groups and roam the streets. I hope that they learn their lesson before the price is too heavy to pay. Stay safe!

What disgusts you during a lockdown?  “Behavior of certain people”  Background : A supermarket in PA which had reported maximum number of cases, had to throw out 26L worth of goods.This is because a woman had “coughed” as a prank on the foods.Margaret Ann Cirko, 35, of Hanover Township, is charged with two counts of making a terroristic threat, one count of threatening to use a “biological agent” and one count of criminal mischiefThe store in which the crimes were committed, Gerrity’s Supermarket in Hanover, lost $35,000 worth of food that had to be thrown out.She continued to cough at many aisles before stealing a case of beer - store officials reported.Source : Coronavirus: Woman charged with contaminating $35K worth of food at Pennsylvania grocery store Even this : Audi driver, 25, ‘spits on police officer’ after being pulled over in Sydney Why is this disgusting? Business are running too low during these times and pranks like this are just adding fuel to the fire.People are already living in fear and things like this will only cause fear.Numbers are already increasing in USA and behaviors like this are nothing but disgusting. Please do remain at home and don’t cause nuisance to the public or police officers. Don’t indulge in these kind of acts. Take things seriously. Image source : Google  Thanks for reading.
